results.content:
Amazing and quick course to brush up my html/CSS and also a great way to build up your portfolio/resume site if you like me have been waiting forever to do so. Now with this course, I got super motivated to complete my own version of resume using the concepts and libraries introduced in this course. 

The resume turned out to be really fun project for a lazy saturday afternoon https://jasmeetsinghbhatia.github.io/resume/
